name: Endless Octopus Runner
description: Welcome to my first game, i know the game is very bad with trash deisgn and gameplay/menu/sound effect etc, but am happy about this game for now, this game was made possible because i followed blackthornpod endless runner series with menu and pause menu tutorials made by brackeys. i merged them together and it gave me this results!. so thanks for playing/downloading the game or viewing the page i guess?.
